title: Agents and inspectors
context: §321-4 Agents and inspectors. There shall be appointed by the director of health a suitable number of agents and inspectors in such localities as may be necessary, who shall carry into effect all laws and regulations for the public health, and such ordinances relating to public health as the director may direct. [PC 1869, c 59, §3; am L 1925, c 34, §2; RL 1935, §902; am L 1937, c 122, §3; am L 1943, c 43, §1(6); RL 1945, §2010; am L 1945, c 209, §1; RL 1955, §46-10; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §19; HRS §321-4]
